This workspace contains a Next.js restaurant website for Zaatar, a Middle Eastern restaurant.

## Project Details
- **Framework**: Next.js 16 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Pages**: Home, Menu, About, Contact
- **Theme**: Middle Eastern cuisine with amber/orange color palette

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server on http://localhost:3000
- Pages are located in `src/app/` directory
- Navigation and footer are in `src/app/layout.tsx`

## Customization
- Menu items: `src/app/menu/page.tsx`
- About content: `src/app/about/page.tsx`
- Contact details: `src/app/contact/page.tsx`
- Color scheme: Update Tailwind amber classes throughout components
